Section.Catchline: Unlawful use of insignia of American Legion; penalty.

SectionBody.Text: Any person who willfully wears the badge, button or other insignia of the American Legion shall be guilty of a misdemeanor of the second degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082 or s. 775.083; provided, that the provisions of this section shall not apply to any member of the American Legion.
